blueprints.name: NeuroShield-MDC
blueprints.description: A coordination framework targeting neuroinflammation pathways via gateable zinc-carrier complexes.

blueprints.name: ViroBlocker-MDC
blueprints.description: A viral entry inhibitor programmed through Cu-ligand switching to activate only in high ROS environments.

blueprints.name: OncoFilter-MDC
blueprints.description: Selective cytotoxic complex gated by dual-ligand threshold logic, optimized for hypoxic tumors.
